instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL DEPENDENCIES: `yarn add react-icons framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge` immediately.
3. THEME ENFORCEMENT: Force dark mode by adding 'dark' class to the html/body tag in index.html or App.js. Do not build a light mode toggle unless requested.
4. GLASSMORPHISM: Use the 'glass' utility defined in colors.gradients for all sticky headers and overlays.
5. SPLIT SCREEN: For the 'Active Lab' page, use `h-[calc(100vh-4rem)]` to ensure the split screen takes full available height without scrolling the window.
6. LOGOS: Use `react-icons/si` for AWS (SiAmazonaws), Azure (SiMicrosoftazure), and GCP (SiGooglecloud). Do not use images for these logos.
7. CHARTS: Use `recharts` for the 'Skilltrack Dashboard' readiness metrics. Style them with the defined palette colors (Cyan/Indigo).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic gradients or centered text everywhere.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all code snippets, terminal outputs, and technical data values.
Ensure all interactive elements have `data-testid` attributes.
Prioritize 'Manrope' for UI text - it is modern and readable.
